radiographic_examinations.findings: Normal nuchal translucency (NT = 1.3 mm) and an enlarged bladder with a diameter of 12 mm.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: A repeated ultrasound after 1 week showed a slightly reduced bladder with a diameter of 10 mm.

radiographic_examinations.findings: Multiple structural abnormalities including the right multicystic kidney, left hydronephrosis, and cleft lip and palate.
